mapper.insert: insert into user_info (ID, username, password, sex, city, sign, phone, birth, roleId, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update user_info set username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign = #{sign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, birth = #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, roleId = #{roleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, username, password, sex, city, sign, phone, birth, roleId, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from user_info where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, username, password, sex, city, sign, phone, birth, roleId, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from user_info
